MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: Get-AzureNetworkSecurityGroup -Name "RestrictWestUSAppAccess" | Set-AzureNetworkSecurityRule -Name "ALLOW HTTP Barracuda" -Type Inbound -Priority 201 -Action Allow -SourceAddressPrefix '191.0.0.1' -SourcePortRange '*' -DestinationAddressPrefix '*' -DestinationPortRange '80' -Protocol TCP
